data.message: Where do you enter the code?

replies.message: Hey Chris, you select your dream destination first and then follow the steps on the website to be able to enter your code. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) 9am - 6pm. Hope that helps
Coca-Cola hi I tried this but it says the code is invalid, also the code is on the reverse side of the sleeve on Diet Coke.

Hi Chris, that doesn't sound right, the codes can normally be found under the cap or on a cardboard insert inside multipacks of promotional packs. Could you send us a PM of your code so we can have a look into this for you. Thanks :)
